        .uniform-grid {
          display: grid;

          grid-auto-rows: 188px;
          grid-auto-flow: dense;
          max-width: 1060px; 
          margin: 0 auto; 
          gap: 15px;
        }

        .grid-item {        
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;

          overflow: hidden;
          background: #f8f8f8;
        }

        .grid-item img {
          display: block;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover; 
          display: block;
        }
      </style>
